snippet.title: 7th Legion - Night Dive Studios Trailer
snippet.description:
Now Available on Steam!

http://store.steampowered.com/app/327910/

There's no Salvation from this army! 

Can you survive this furiously fast, kill-for-money, real-time blood-fest? There's nowhere to hide as you smash your opponent in'to-the-limit' conflict. And, while you've got a few nanoseconds to spare, you've got to build to survive, mechs, tanks, troops, mounted slavens - a host of murderous military units who will hone their killing skills with experience. 

Visit Night Dive Studios!
www.nightdivestudios.com
https://www.facebook.com/NightDiveStu...
@NightDiveStudio

Visit Retroism!
Website: retroism.com
Facebook: facebook.com/retroismgames
Twitter: @retroismgames
Instagram: instagram.com/retroismgames
Pinterest: pinterest.com/retroism

Trailer:
http://www.lockevincent.com 
@lockevincent
